review: Incredible little gadget that belongs in every TV room. Streaming to the device from just about any phone, computer, or tablet is a breeze and managing the device is easy as well. I don't know what I did without it! Chromecast can double as dongle to give your tablet or laptop a mirrored monitor which is great for working in a small group when you want to display a document on scree. Highly recommend.

review: Purchased nearly a dozen of these for friends and family. Glad all of these are with manufacturers warranty from Google and Amazon got them in 1 day. There is tons of Chinese fakes out there that try to emulate these nice Media Streamers. I would never consider buying something that falls apart in a week of use hence the need only to buy branded items like Google Chromecast, Apple TV, and Amazon Firestick. I hope someday to buy one of those D-Link Wifi Streamers, yet I don't see myself moving to Australia.
